summary.span: 用作验证控件的抽象基类。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供核心实现的所有验证控件。The class provides the core implementation for all validation controls. 验证控件用于验证相关输入控件中的用户输入。Validation controls are used to validate user input in an associated input control. 当用户输入的值未通过验证时，验证控件将显示一条错误消息。When the user enters a value that fails validation, the validation control displays an error message. 由于验证控件分开的输入控件，可以相对于输入控件在页面上任意位置放置错误消息。Because a validation control is separated from the input control, you can position the error message anywhere on the page relative to the input control. ASP.NET 提供了多个执行特定类型的验证的验证控件。ASP.NET provides several validation controls that perform specific types of validation. 下表描述了这些控件。The following table describes these controls. |验证控件Validation control|描述Description| |------------------------|-----------------| ||通过设置验证针对另一个输入控件中输入的值，针对一个常量值，或针对正确的数据类型的值属性。Validates a value against the value entered into another input control, against a constant value, or against a proper data type by setting the property to .| ||验证使用的用户提供的自定义验证例程的值。Validates a value using a user-provided custom validation routine.| ||验证该值是否值的范围之内。Validates whether a value is within a range of values.| ||验证使用正则表达式的值。Validates a value using a regular expression.| ||验证确认必填字段中输入一个值。Validates that a value was entered in a required field.| 验证控件始终验证服务器上关联的输入的控件。Validation controls always validate the associated input control on the server. 验证控件还具有完整的客户端实现，它允许启用脚本的 （如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本) 的浏览器客户端上执行验证。Validation controls also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 客户端验证发送到服务器之前检查用户输入，从而增强了验证过程。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 这使得在提交表单时，避免往返行程的服务器端验证所需信息之前客户端上检测到的错误。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 多个验证控件可以与单个输入控件，用于验证不同的条件。Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria. 例如，你可以将多个验证控件应用上控件。For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a control. 你可以使用控件以确保输入中的值控件位于内设置的范围，和一个控件以确保用户输入的值。You can use a control to ensure that the value entered in the control is within a set range, and a control to ensure that the user enters a value. ASP.NET 提供了很多能够回发到服务器的控件。ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server. 当这些控件之一具有其`CausesValidation`属性设置为`true`，该控件回发到服务器时是否执行验证。When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to the server. 以下控件可以回发到服务器：The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 其中一些控件回发到服务器时，才`AutoPostBack`属性设置为`true`。Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`. 这些控件各有`ValidationGroup`属性，设置时，验证仅验证指定的组中的控件时控件触发回发到服务器。These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server. 若要验证对控件进行分组，请设置为相同的值的每个验证控件的属性。To group validation controls, set the property of each validation control to the same value. 若要将与验证控件关联的输入的控件，使用属性。To associate an input control with a validation control, use the property. 若要指定要验证失败时，在验证控件中显示的文本，请使用属性。To specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails, use the property. 你也可以显示通过使用未通过验证页中的所有控件的摘要控件。You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a control. 若要指定要在中显示的文本控制，请使用属性。To specify the text to display in a control, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果你设置属性但没有设置属性、 的值属性还验证控件中显示。If you set the property without setting the property, the value of the property is also displayed in the validation control. 在使用验证程序控件时，应始终检查服务器端验证在执行任何处理之前的结果。When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing. 回发但之后调用事件方法之前，页调用验证程序控件和聚合到其结果属性。After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the property. (你还可以调用使用显式的验证程序控件`Validate`方法。)在你自己的代码中，应检查属性返回`true`之前处理输入。(You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the property returns `true` before processing input. 即使启用脚本的浏览器可能会阻止回发发生客户端上，如果验证检查失败，始终还应检查服务器在处理经验证的数据之前的代码中。Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check in server code before processing validated data. 你可以手动执行验证。You can also manually perform validation. 若要验证页上的所有验证控件，使用方法。To validate all validation controls on the page, use the method. 可以通过使用验证各个验证控件的控件的方法。Individual validation controls can be validated by using the method of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用中的属性`Page_Load`方法时，你必须首先显式调用方法。If you use the property in a `Page_Load` method, you must first explicitly call the method. 因为验证发生之后页，但之前的事件处理程序的事件`Click`或`Command`事件，直到属性会被更新调用方法。Because validation occurs after the event for the page, but before the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` events, the property is not updated until the method is called. 作为替代方法，可以在事件处理程序中放置你的代码`Click`或`Command`事件而不是`Page_Load`方法。As an alternative, you can place your code in the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` event instead of the `Page_Load` method. 不是所有 Web 服务器控件都支持验证的控件。Not all Web server controls support validation controls. 与验证控件可以验证的标准控件包括：The standard controls that can be validated with a validation control are: - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 为要验证的输入控件属性必须应用于控件。For an input control to be validated, the attribute must be applied to the control. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用派生自的验证程序控件内控制，请确保该验证程序控件与之关联的控件位于同一面板。When you use validator controls that derive from inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关使用，控制为部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 当验证失败时，你可以将焦点设置在关联的输入控件上设置属性`true`。When validation fails, you can set the focus on the associated input control by setting the property to `true`. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用多个验证控件验证用户输入中的有效值控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use multiple validation controls to verify that the user enters a valid value in a control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits ID 必须引用同一容器用作验证控件中的控件。The ID must refer to a control within the same container as the validation control. 它必须在同一页上或用户控件，或它必须在同一模板的模板化控件。It must be in the same page or user control, or it must be in the same template of a templated control. 可验证的标准控件包括：The standard controls that can be validated are: - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 为要验证的输入控件属性必须应用于控件。For an input control to be validated, the attribute must be applied to the control. 所有验证控件，除了控件中，将通过验证，如果指定的输入的控件属性包含没有文本。All validation controls, except the control, will pass validation if the input control specified by the property contains no text. 如果你使用控制、 客户端和服务器端验证函数不会调用。If you are using a control, the client-side and server-side validation functions are not called either. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的输入的控件进行验证。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the input control to validate. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证控件中指定的错误消息的显示行为的属性。Use the property to specify the display behavior of the error message in the validation control. 下表列出可用的不同值。The following table lists the different values that can be used. |显示行为Display behavior|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`None`|验证消息永远不会是以内联方式显示。The validation message is never displayed inline.| |`Static`|为验证消息已分配空间的页面布局中。Space for the validation message is allocated in the page layout.| |`Dynamic`|如果验证失败，用于验证消息的空间动态添加到页面。Space for the validation message is dynamically added to the page if validation fails.| > [!NOTE] > 显示行为取决于是否使用了客户端验证。The display behavior depends on whether client-side validation is performed. 如果客户端验证未处于活动状态 (因为浏览器不支持它或者因为已禁用通过使用页指令或属性)，`ValidatorDisplay.Static`和`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`的行为方式相同： 错误消息将向上空间才显示。If client-side validation is not active (because the browser does not support it or because it has been disabled by using the page directive or property), `ValidatorDisplay.Static` and `ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic` behave the same way: the error message takes up space only if it is displayed. 动态分配空间的消息时不显示的功能 (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) 仅适用于客户端验证。The ability to dynamically allocate space for the message when it is not being displayed (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) only works with client-side validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否启用客户端验证。Use the property to specify whether client-side validation is enabled. 验证控件始终在服务器上执行验证。Validation controls always perform validation on the server. 它们还具有完整的客户端实现，它允许 DHTML 支持浏览器 （如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本） 客户端上执行验证。They also have complete client-side implementation that allows DHTML-supported browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 客户端验证发送到服务器之前检查用户输入，从而增强了验证过程。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 这使得在提交表单时，避免往返行程的服务器端验证所需信息之前客户端上检测到的错误。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 默认情况下，此值设置为`true`，从而使客户端验证如果浏览器支持它。By default, this value is set to `true`, which enables client-side validation if the browser supports it. 你可以禁用客户端验证基于控件的控件。You can disable client-side validation on a control-by-control basis. 如果动态更新客户端上创建的页上，布局出现问题，或如果你想要验证发生之前执行一些服务器代码，这非常有用。This is useful if dynamic updating on the client creates problems with the layout of the page, or if you want to execute some server code before validation takes place. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了很多能够回发到服务器的控件。ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server. 当这些控件之一具有其`CausesValidation`属性设置为`true`，该控件回发到服务器时是否执行验证。When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to server. 以下控件可以回发到服务器：The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 其中一些控件回发到服务器时，才`AutoPostBack`属性设置为`true`。Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`. 这些控件各有`ValidationGroup`属性，设置时，验证仅验证指定的组中的控件时控件触发回发到服务器。These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server. 使用要分配给验证组的验证控件属性。Use the property to assign a validation control to a validation group. 类还公开方法和一个方法接受输入的参数。The class also exposes a method and a method that accept a input parameter. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要分配给组的验证控件属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign a validation control to a group. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
